author: Staff Reporter
text:
The annual spot painting contest organised by Vasantha Memorial Cancer Centre will be held at Rosary Matriculation School, Santhome, on Sunday. The theme of this year’s painting contest “I will clean the air to make cancer never” will highlight the risk of cancer caused by smoking. Contestants will be divided into three categories covering classes one to four, five to eight and nine upwards. Eminent artists Keshav, Usha Elangovan and environmentalist Shweta Narayan would form the panel of judges.

For details contact 24717871, 77 or emailvasanthamemorial@

gmail.com
title: Painting contest
